content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 16-23)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) extracting iron ore
- Stone furnace at (16.0,74.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at (14.5,73.5) feeding coal into furnace

### Expanded Mining Operation at (16.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) extracting iron ore
- Stone furnace at (17.0,74.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at (15.5,73.5) feeding coal into furnace

### New Mining Operation at (20.0,70.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0,70.0)
- Stone furnace at (20.0,72.0)
- Wooden chest at (21.5,72.5) for output
- Burner inserter at (20.5,73.5) for output

### Additional Mining Operation at (26.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (26.0,71.0)
- Stone furnace at (26.0,73.0)
- Wooden chest at (27.5,73.5) for output
- Burner inserter at (26.5,74.5) for output

### Partial Mining Operation at (30.0,70.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (30.0,70.0)
- Stone furnace at (30.0,73.0)
- Burner inserter at (30.5,71.5) (not properly connected)

### Power Generation System at (-9.5,-2.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,-2.5) collecting water
- Boiler at (-3.0,-2.5) converting water to steam
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt connection errors (recurring issue)
- Attempted to connect belts directly to furnaces (invalid connection)
- Always use inserters between belts and furnaces/machines
- Verify entity types before attempting connections

### Inserter placement problems (recurring issue)
- Multiple failed inserter placements due to water or existing entities
- Always check terrain type and existing entities before placing inserters
- Consider alternative positions when primary position is blocked

### Mining operation setup issues
- Furnaces showing "NO_INGREDIENTS" status despite nearby drills
- Verify proper inserter connections between drills and furnaces
- Check inserter directions and pickup/drop positions

### Entity collision errors
- Attempted belt connection to occupied position (30.5,70.5)
- Always verify target positions are clear before placing entities
- Use entity drop_position/pickup_position properties carefully

### Fuel management problems
- Multiple burner entities showing "NO_FUEL" warnings
- Ensure all burner entities have coal in their fuel inventory
- Consider automating fuel distribution with inserters

### Throughput monitoring
- Zero throughput reported despite active mining operations
- Verify all components in production chain are properly connected
- Check inserter functionality and fuel supply

### Water placement issues (recurring)
- Continued problems placing entities near water
- Maintain safe distance from water edges when placing entities
- Use map view to identify water boundaries before placement
